1.content:
It seemed like an ordanairy day at Moreau High School at least thats what the teachers thought. The Students on the other hand knew full well that today the school would become a warzone.

The nerds were fed up with being constantly being picked on and teased not to mention being beaten up. For weeks they started rumors that they were going to rebel and put everyone (particuly those snooty jocks) in their place.


The jocks on the other hand felt that the nerd's pathetic attempts to scare them was luaghable but when they saw the those geeks weren't joking they knew there was going to be a battle but they were comfortable enough with their pysacal prowess that the nerds were no threat to them


Finally the day of the Battle arrived many bookworms stated it would be just like the French Revolution but since hadly anyone had read Les Miserables no one knew what that meant.

Now who are you?
1.title: And so it begins

11.content: What kind of Jock are you?
11.title: A jock

111.content:
Name: Sammy Smith

Age: 17

Favorite Color: Blood Red
Favorite Food:...Beer
Favorite Music: Rock n Roll

You're name is Sammy Smith and you are a typical human jock.

You have blond hair, light brown eyes, a tan complextion, and a perfect Basketball player's build.

You have a typical disdain for nerds however you also show a bit of old-faishioned bias towards Anthros even the ones who play on your team! Which means you're not always as popular as you could be.

But even Jocks have to take other classes, right now you're in cooking class baking muffins.

For some reason your baked goods always turn out burnt and black, unlike Albert's who turn out perfectly.

Albert is a typical nerd, one you like to pound on reguarly. He exuses himself from the classroom and he leaves his cranberry muffins lying out in the open. You sure are hungry but you don't want to eat your own burnt pastries... There is but one thing to do!
111.title: Muffin Madness!

choices: You little nerd! I'll kill you!
Please help me! I don't wanna be a beaver!
1111.content:
Heck! One Muffin can't hurt!

You grab the pastry when no one is looking and eat it as fast as you can!

You lick your lips after you finish that was delishious!

No sooner than you smack your lips you begin to cough! For every cough you shrink a few inches!

You notice your fingernails become claws and hands get covered in brown fur!

"What's happaning to me?" You ask as you gasp for air

You're eyesight seems to be dimming and your scense of smell become sharper.

"Dude!" Someone says "You're turning into a beaver!"

Alas it is true! You are slowly growing smaller and plumper, you're two front teeth become buck teeth and most humiliating of all a flat paddle-like tail pops out of you!

The other Anthros in the room luagh at you. No doubt becuase you snubbed them before.

Albert comes back into the room with a smug smile on his face!

Your reaction is...
1111.title: Leave it to Beaver!

choices: Run and get the other jocks.
11111.content: With your beaver tail you sweep him, and then give him a stone hard spank on the buttox with your tail.Then you grip his underwear with your new,strong beaver teeth.He runs out of the room and yells"I'll get revenge!"
11111.title: Albert flees the battle

111111.content:
You run after Albert! Unfortuetly Beavers are not very fast.

Albert runs down the stars and you follow but your small webbed feet are very clumsy and you trip!

When you land Albert has escaped you once again and what's more he has led you into a trap!

"OH NO!" You scream "NOT LINDA!"

Linda was a big fat girl who has a relentless crush on you! Her small piggy eyes leer hungerly!

"Oooooh!" She squeals "A fluffy puffy beaver!"

You try to escape but she picks you up by the tail and holds you upside down

"I'm gonna hug you and squeeze you and call you George!"

She throws her flabby arms around you and you can barely breath!

You have two choices
111111.title: The Porker Girl

1111112.content:
You see your chance as she stops to look in your eyes. You bite both her thumbs wit satisfaction and relish. As Linda squeals and screams you run away to warn the other jocks of the start of the Battle.

After a while you find Alex who was the hottest, and all-around cool guy. You tell him what happened, he keeps his cool and says "Get the other jocks the nerds are in for a sur..." BOOM!!!!! Everything was confusing and we saw green gas coming from a hole. The nerds all say " You jocks suck, and you behave like octogenarians!! " Since the nerds had captured every jock, we all went "HUH???" and blacked out.

choices: Ask Mark if he has a girlfriend
Ask Mark if he wants to shoot hoops with you after school
Ask Mark if he can teach you some cooking skills
1112.content:
Ooo, look at Marky's muffins! They look delicious! "Hey, Mark!" you say. "Can I have one of your muffins?"

"Sure, dude! What's the matter? Did you burn yours again?"

"Oh yeah!" you say. "I always do. How come you're such a good cook?"

"My mom taught me. She got divorced when I was 12 and while she was at work I had to fix the food for me and my little brother."

"What can you cook?"

While Mark talks you are thinking how cute he is with his grey eyes and short black hair. He has a small nose with freckles on it and a funny way of smiling while he talks.

choices: Try to like the Dinosuar girl

"Hey Mark," You say "Do you have a girlfriend?"

"Of coarse!" Mark says "She's right over there!"

You look to where Mark is pointing and what you see is a green female Tarbosaurus Anthro

(For those who don't know Tarbosaurus is like a smaller version of T-rex)

"Yep! Isn't she beautiful?" Mark is no doubt in love with this big lizard

"Er... What's her name?" You ask

"Ember." Mark replies "Ember the Tarbosaurus!"

You grab a muffen to eat and comteplate this akward situation

"You boys want any?" She asks with a big toothy smile

"Sure thing Sugar-saurus!" Mark says as he takes one

As much as you despise anthros you could try to like this one for Mark's sake

(Though you are throughly annoyed that you're beloved Mark has been stolen by a big reptile)

"Really!" Mark exclaims "Where did you here that? Maybe if it's true we can find that nerd and then..." He takes Ember's clawed paw and looks into her yellow eyes

You feel as if you're about to barf! Mark loving a Tarbosuarus Anthro is one thing but if he turns himself into one...

Suddenly

Suddenly, the room becomes pitch black! Everyone screams while you just stand around like an idiot blinking your eyes.

When the light comes back on everything seems to be normal except...

"Mark is gone!" Shouts Ember.

True enough Mark is nowhere to be seen insted there is a funny looking piece of paper next to the muffins

Ember picks it up and reads it.

"It's for you." She says handing you the paper.

You look at and it reads

'Sammy.

We are holding Mark hostege and only we know where he is.

If the Jocks don't give in to our demands by 24 hours Mark will get the Mother of all wedgies!

The Nerds'

"DUH! My super sensitive nose can sniff him out!" She responds

With that she heads out the door led by her nose

You feel you have no choice but to follow Ember.

Ember follows the nerd's trail with her nose to the ground. She sniffs and sniffs and finally seems to pick up on the trail of her beloved Mark.

"He's somewhere around here..." She says

Her nose leads both herself and you to...
11121111.title: Follow her

11122.content:
"Hey, Mark," you say. "Do you want to-"

"No," Mark says.

"But you didn't even let me finish my question!"

Mark shrugs. "I don't want to shoot hoops after school today."

Wow! Mark must be psychic.

"Mark?" you say. "What number am I thinking of?" You think of the number three.

Mark thinks for a moment. "Seven?"

You are disappointed. It would have been fun to have a friend who was a psychic and could read your mind. Unless he really is a psychic and is deliberately trying to mislead you. Maybe he knew you were thinking three and said seven on purpose?

"I'm not trying to mislead you," Mark says.

choices: You think of a way to test Mark's psychic ability
111221.content:
"Mark!" you shout. "You really ARE a psychic!"

Mark laughs. "What makes you think that?"

"B-b-but you knew what I was thinking!"

"It's just stuff you are always thinking. You always want to play basketball and you always think people are trying to trick you."

You point your finger at Mark. "No, no, noooo, buddy! You read my mind!"

"I didn't read your mind." Mark is still laughing. You think about what he said. It's true you do always want to play basketball and it's also true you always think people are trying to play a trick on you. In fact... maybe Mark is trying to play a trick on you right now. Obviously you need a better test of his psychic abilities.

"What are you thinking about?" Mark asks.

You look up quickly. Mark has grin on his face. That little Trickster! You have GOT to find out whether he is really a psychic or not.

After cooking class you go to Gym.

As the class begins their warm-up exersises you begin to plot. How to test Mark's supposed powers....


You could trow a ball at his head but that sounds really juvenile. You could try to sneak up on him and give him a wedgie...But that sounds even more juvenile.

KA BANG!

Mark lowers himself to all fours, lowers his horned head and charges

Suddenly

Pandora quickly produced a bucket of fresh pink paint out of nowhere and promptly places it right next to your snout. "Now you shall suffer the pain you always gave us!" she said with an evil smirk on her face, "haven't you heard that pink is the fashion trend this month?"

You actually didn't think they would ever go THIS far. With eyes bulging out in trembling fear and mouth agape, you let out a frantic cry as several hands fumble and explore around your body, stripping away your clothing. "You nerds won't get away with this!" he desperately snarled, hoping to scare them away. You yelp out as a hand reaches down to your groin, yanking down your boxer, leaving your lower body completely exposed.

Your attempt to intimidate obviously didn't work, you were tied up and outnumbered! Instead your words were greeted with a glob of thick paint that splattered down onto your snout. Within minutes, you were covered head to tail in glistening pink. Even your crotch was pink! A snort of giggle explode from the group of nerds, making you blush heavily. How could he let this happen! Now naked and PINK! Pink of all the colors!

"He looks cuter in pink!" Rook suddenly piped out. An awkward silence followed with the nerds staring at their fellow comrade. "What?" he asks with a shrug, looking around nervously. Even you managed to be dumbfounded by his words, despite your own problems. Quickly, the fox shrunk back, looking quite flustered and embarassed.

"Ahem... Anyways..." the human broke the ice with her words, "nerds! We shall..."

1212.content:
You are about to enter history class when something strong grabs you by the shirt collar and pulls you away!

You turn to see 'gulp' Taren the Dragon!

"Hey there Ichy..." He says in the sly hissing tone that Dragons are famous for "So I heard you're the leader of this nerd rebellion..."

"W-who told you that?" You ask fearfully

"Let's just say a little foxy told me." Taren grins at you with razor-sharp teeth

"A little foxy?!" You gasp astounded that could only mean... Suddenly you want to crack Rook's spine in two for a very good reason!

"Tell me, what is this plan all about?" Taren asks as he walks into the Boy's bathroom with you in his clutches

"Unlike some people, I'm not a snitch!" You snap at him "I will not betray my fellow intellectuals even if it kills me!"

"Suit yourself." The Dragon says cuasualy He tucks you under one arm so your rear end is in easy striking range. He raises one meaty scaly hand to strike, in a second he is spanking you!

"Ow! Ow! Stop! It hurts!" You wriggle and flail trying to get away but once you're in a dragon's grasp you're not getting away untill he let's you go!

"You want me to stop? Than tell me about your plan!" He sneers

"No I won't" You snap back all that gets you is anouther smack on the rear!

You know you won't be able take much more of this, then you notice that Taren's tail is wagging in front of you and you can easily grab it and could use your teeth to bite the heck out of it (You know that Dragon's have sensitive tails)

"I'm not like other jocks." Minos says with a sniff "When I was in middle school I was a very shy and everyone teased me. I started working out and became a jock just to get some respect! I know what it's like to be picked on."

You take a good look at the bovine, he is not like Taren in his body shape he is much more slender though still quite buff his horns are monsterous and they often get cuaght in things like tree branches he has a mop of yellow 'headfur' on the top of his head

He turns to you. "Actually there is a deeper reason I helped you. I... I have a crush on Pandora..."

"Pandora?" You gasp befuddled "But she is a human and you're a...

"Hunk of beef I know." Minos sighs "Just tell her I won't fight with nerds but I won't fight against them either."
He walks away leaving you two choices

Tie him up and grill him

You decide to find Pandora and tell her.

"Tattletales aren't worth very much either." You growl

Rook looks shocked but then pretends inocence

"What on earth are talking about?" He asks with puppy-dog eyes

Do you...

"We nerds don't take lightly to traitors." You growl menecingly

You give the fox a good swift kick in the pants and he tumbles out the door

A very young looking Skunk anthro!

"We could use someone with chemical weaponry." You muse to Pandora "New guy?"

You decide not to tell Pandora just yet. It might distract everyone from their duty insted you decide to head over to the computer lab.

"Oh yes, there was something." She clears her throaght "It seems Mr. Quaxo is no longer going to be the only Anthro teacher. A new one came today."

Age: 14

Favorite Color: Green
Personal Comfort Food: Strawberries with Sour Cream and Brown Sugar
Favorite Music: Classical


You're name is Pandora Nashton.

You have red hair, green eyes, a pale complextion and an average height. It's kind of amazing that such a fair beauty would be a nerd but alas it is true.

You are quite cunning and shrewd, a perfect leader for the Nerd Revolt! You're 2nd in command is the eaquely nerdy Ichabod Crane (Poor fellow, he get's so picked on becuase of that name)

On your way to class you run into 'gulp' a bully!

You've run into Lucy Willcox! She's blonde blue-eyed and nothing but trouble for you!

"I'm gonna get you nerd." Lucy grunts balling up her fists

You shiver and close your eyes wait for the punching to start but it doesen't and you open your eyes a peek.

You see Marzipan has grabbed Lucy by the waist and is preforming a heimlich manuver on her!

"I'm going to give you a big squishy hug!" The Cat says in a sing-song voice

She gives three big squeezes and Lucy lets out a grunt with each squeeze!

Marzipan then shoves Lucy away who is only too happy to get away from the crazy cat!

"Thank you." You whisper

"No prob Pan." Marzipan meows "Humans are easy for Anthros. It's kind of sad that there aren't more Anthro nerds. The only ones I've seen so far are Fireheart and Rook."

"Well." You begin "I have some theories on why that could be but..."

The two of you shake hands and walk away... along the way you see...

choices: Wait and try to escape later
12211.content:
You see of all things 'gasp!' Rook, your own personal messanger talking to Minos the Boxing Bull!

You feel like you could rip that treacherous vulpine's brushy tail off when he notices you and hurries over to you.

"Good day Pandora!" Rook says cheerfully "Minos just told me he has a crush on you."

"Minos said that." You respond flatly not beleaving a word of it

"In fact he said he wanted me to give you this flower!"

He holds up a beautiful white flower, it looks like a daisy!

"He... gave this to me?" You ask

"He only wishes you to think of of him" Rook says in his most sincere voice

Without thinking you inhale the blossom, its scent is lovely!

Then you start to feel woozy, you sway on your feet and lean against the wall for support,
Your face feels hot and feaverish, the world around you melts away as you begin to feel yourself sliping into a dream world...

You feel faint and you try to wipe away to drool that has been forming at your mouth...

Suprise suprise! Your mouth has become a muzzle!

Your eyes snap open and you rush to a window to see your reflection!

You've become a dainty black and white cow anthro!

You have black and white patches of fur and your snub nose is pure peach!

You feel a long supple tail growing behind you and that's the last straw! You march over to Minos and scream "What have you done to me?!"

"I love you my Pretty Pandora but alas humans can not marry cattle. So I used a mutagen that Rook had created that could turn humans into anthros to make you my little cow!"

He then swoops you into his arms and whispers in your ear "Don't worry I'll take care of you."

What do you do

122112.content:
You feel too weak to scream for help as the transforming serum is still coarsing through you.

Minos lets out a bellow of triumph and quickly heads out of the hallway!

'The shame of it!' You think to yourself 'Me! Pandora Nashton The brainest girl in school turned into a dairy cow by this hunk of beef! Why coulden't I be turned into a fox? Or a cat? or anything other than some dumb beast of the barnyard?!'

Minos treks through the school until he reaches the Gym. There he lays you down, you have only enough streangh to sit up and lean against the wall.

"There." He says "You shall be safe here." He reaches his furry hand to stroke your ruddy red hair, you turn your face away from him so he can't see your tears.

"Don't worry about your nerd friends." He says trying to calm you down "I'll make sure they don't get hurt... at least not too much."

'I've failed everyone.' You think to yourself in despair

"Please don't cry." Minos whispers Everything will be just fine, Trust me!

"Hey Minos!" a cajun accent interrupts "The nerds have started their attack!"

You know that voice! That New Orleans accent belongs to none other than Sammy Smith!

"Watch Pandora until I get back." Minos tells Sammy "And if so much as a hair on her head is harmed I'll put your head on a pike!"

That is so typical of jocks, so nasty and brutish, even to their own kind!

Sammy strolls in looking at you with his piggy brown eyes. He towers over you and he licks his lips before speaking.

"Do you remember Clover the Pig? The one who died before we started High School?"

You think back to the last year of middle school and you remember the plump, pink pig anthro who took ballet, she wasen't exactly a friend but you did help her when she needed help with math

"I remember her." You say "They said she was run over by a drunk driver."

"She wasen't." Sammy says "Me and my Daddy kidnapped her off the street and killed her and ate her! My Daddy is so rich that he can get away with murder!"

You gasp with horror!

"That's cannibalism!" You shout

"Pashaw!" Sammy scoffs "It's only cannibalism if they're human! Anthros are stinkin' beasts that just happan to speak, walk upright and wear clothes!"

You are utterly terrified now! Sammy kneels down and looks you in the eye.

"I like to eat Anthros Pan. I like to eat little girl anthros. I particuly like to eat NERDY little girl anthros!"

There is no doubt what his intentions are! You tremble from your new snub nose to your new cow tail!

"But you can't!" You wimper "Minos said..."

"You think that Texas Longhorn scares me?" Sammy jeers "I can boot his hinders from here to Mexico! No stinkin' beast is a match for Sammy Smith!"

Suddenly
122112.title: This can't be happaning...

BANG!

The impact has both you and Sammy flying! You manage to land on your feet and hands while Sammy collides into a wall!

Even though you still aren't in love with Minos, you are glad he truly cares about you.

"For that you will pay dearly."

You and your comrades enter through a secret door under a starcase, once there Albert and Bob lock the door thight so no enemies can get in.

The secret sanctuary has everything a nerd can want! Books, computers chess and card games. There is also always a steady supply of food and drink so no one has to leave out of hunger.

You lay down against a beanbag chair and sigh. "Our glorious revolution, I ruined it."

"You didn't ruin it." Fireheart purrs as he wipes your tears away with a paw "It was that blasted Rook! That trecherous Fox sold you out to that pervert Bull!"

Fireheart hisses with contempt, Marzipan swishes her tail and all your human friends murmurs in agreement

Marzipan turns and looks to the bookshelf and picks out a book.

"This is a book that Mr. Quaxo introduced me to." She says slowly "It was written by his father Colonel Skimbleshanks."

"And just whenyou think Anthro names can't get any weirder..." Bob mutters before Fireheart shushes him

"It's a story about Anthros and how they came to be," Marzipan says "How the Anthros were created and what they did."

"Gosh..." Alice says "I always assumed Anthros have always lived with humans."

Evreyone including yourself can't help but giggle at Alice's innocent ignorance. Alice blushes and wished she never said anything but Ichabod puts a comforting hand on her shoulder.

"I remember my Father telling me about the Anthros creation." Ichabod says "He told me he was only ten years old when the first Anthros were created and they looked nothing like they do now." He puases "My Father told me they were made to be soilders to fight overseas."

"True." Marzipan nods "But back then no one called them soilders. They called them 'biological weapons' and this book tells of what it was like to be an Anthro soilder ... Would you like to hear it Pan?"

Marzipan begins to read

"My name is Skimbleshanks. I am one of the three surviving Anthro solders of the Battle of Wundagore in the 3rd world war."

As Marzipan continues to read you notice Ichabod getting cozy with Alice on the small sofa but you know that it is none of your buissness and turn your attention back to the story.

"I write this history not only for curious human historians but for the sake of my children and my children's children so we never forget the past..."

Marzipan clears her throat

"WW3 was a costly war for humanity half the population was lost in battle in order to spare human life, a scientist named Hubert Chimara began hyper-evolving animals to replace human solders on the front lines.

His first creations were foucused on brute strengh. Big Cats, Bears, Wolves and other large carnivores eventualy he used large herbivores as well."

Taren's sister?

You decide Bon Bon will be safer with her own brother. You decide she must be reterned to her brother but the thought troubles you. This must be done delicatly.

12212211.title: Clean getaway

12212212.content:
"What do you think you're doing, Pancake?"

That unfortunate nickname belonged only to her enemies: the Jocks. Which could only mean Taren the Terrible had noticed her from behind the door... Crabcakes.

"Hey, I said what do you think you're DOING, Pan-cake?!"

Taren shoved you up against the wall; damn his draconic strength! If only he'd been on your side!

"Tar, knock it off!"

A girl, presumably human, walked up to Taren: probably his new girlfriend everyone was talking about. Not only was she pretty, she had the tempestuous Taren on a leash! People didn't call her the Hellfire Princess for no reason; this girl had the burns to prove her love!

"But Addy..."

"Tar, knock it off. NOW."

Some people had rumors that Addison Wilcox had supernatural powers - the ability to control others. Some just gave it up as her womanly power of persuasion. Whatever it was, Addison dispelled Taren's anger, and he shifted back to normal.

"She found your baby sister! You should be happy... Go thank her."

Addison was that special mix of person; not exactly a jock, not exactly a nerd. A peacemaker, in this time of war among social status. She welcomed one and all, and respected all forms of nature. In a school like this, she was the only one who could be considered a friend.

"Thank you... Pan-"

"Dora."

"Pandora, for finding my little sister... I don't know what I would have done otherwise..."

He begrudgingly shook her hand, and Addison gave a satisfactory smile. The class resumed, and all returned to normal... That is, until you ran into...
12212212.title: Taren's Rage

122122121.content:
The Principal, a Jock if there ever was one! Why couldn't you find an ally in this school, besides your tiny group of friends? Right now, as it stood, the school most definitely sided with the jocks, and you'd have to do something to change that in order to get by...

"Pandora Nashton! Why am I not surprized a low-life like you is skipping class? Think you're too smart for it, huh?"

"No sir-"

"Think you can just breeze in and out of class?"

"No, sir-"

"Well, you're quite wrong, Missy, and if I were you, I'd take examples from the upstanding members of your class-"

"Sir!"

The bell chimed overhead, completely baffling the Principal.

"It was lunch time. I've got to get to class!"

You gleefully skip away, leaving the stumped Principal in the dust. And score one for the nerds...

"HELP!" You yowl at the top of your voice "SOMEBODY?! ANYBODY?"

Thank Goodness! You saw Mr. Quaxo approaching! Mr. Quaxo is an orange tabby cat and the only Anthro teacher in Moreau High.

Now several students and techers have been drawn out the Jock's faces are smug, the nerds look like they might faint any minute now! The techers and other students look worried.

Mr. Quaxo turns to you and says

"Rook. You are one of my finest students I care about you as much as I care for any student of mine. I can not for the life of me imagine you particeipateing in something so deviant and dangerous. But I can not ignore Samuel's claims. Is there going to be a lock-down?"

One the other paw telling the teachers will mean all those weeks of planning and hard work will be for nuaght! Plus you can see Marzipan and Fireheart glaring daggers at you from the distance!

Squeel, your skin will peel
Tattle, your bone will rattle.

123112.title: A tearful confesstion

1341122.content:
You look at the bookshelves you see they are a mix of contemporariy Teen's literature and the Classics of Literairy history from Beowulf to Ulysses.

You turn away from fiction and turn to the non-fiction there you find the latest, most advanced books on Biology, Astronmy, History, Mathamatics and Philosophy.

You see one particular book that catches you're eye it is titled "Totems and Shamans"

You pick it up and look at the cover art it looks like an illistration of a man with the wings of a bird.


Not many people know this but you used to dabble in Celtic Shamanism yourself.

Some people would call it Paganism or Black Magic but you have long since figured it is really nothing more than communicating with invisable nature spirits


Should you read the book or should you continue on you way?
1341122.title: A Curious  Book

1342.title: A jock in peril

info.brief_description: The Jocks and the Nerds battle for supremicy. Contains furry options
info.description:
It's high time there was story that wasen't about size change or weight gain (too many of those) Now it comes time for the ultimate High School battle Jocks VS Nerds!


The thing about this particular story is that humans and anthros co-exsist and yes you can be either an anthro jock or an anthro nerd

No toilet humor I will delete any toilet humor.

No killing, Their will only be typical 'pranks' like noogies, wedgies and other things.


Humans turning into anthros is fine even encouraged

Edit: I may have to re-state my no killing rule, while a character may attempt to kill another no character will get killed

UPDATE: Since these characters have evolved so much since there original conception I'm adding to each character a short Bio listing things like favorite color, favorite food and so forth, that said notice how the Jocks have 'Favorite Foods' while the Nerds and Teachers (Except one) have 'Personal Comfort Foods' instead
